  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int cardID, Map<AnglePos,Angle> angles, CardType cardType, boolean isTurned, int cardScore, boolean lUsed, boolean dUsed)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      cardID - id of the card
      angles - map of invalid input: '<'AnglePos, Angle> for the card
      cardType - CardType of the card
      isTurned - parameter that indicates if it is turned or not
      cardScore - the score of the card
      lUsed - parameter that indicates if the card has been used for an LGoal
      dUsed - parameter that indicates if the card has been used for an DiagonalGoal
